snippet.title: Jock Studio - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
#JockStudio #BLits 

BLits Games previews its newest project: BL / Yaoi / Gay Visual Novel - 'Jock Studio'! 🏟️📹💪

Follow the story of Ace Anderson, an indecisive and aimless freshman at the prestigious all-boys sports campus, Olympus University. Having lived his life without purpose, Ace discovers it in the most unlikely of places - Jock Studio!

Teaser Video by Howl

🎮Play the FREE DEMO & support the project now on Kickstarter:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/blitsgames/jock-studio?ref=2i7lum

FOLLOW US ON SOCIAL MEDIA:
Twitter (X) - https://twitter.com/blitsblgames
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/blitsblgames/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@blitsgames
Tumblr: https://www.tumblr.com/blitsgames
-------------------------------------------------
IMPORTANT DISCLAIMER:
The story, persons, places, characters, and events presented in Jock Studio and on blitsgames.com are purely fictional and not intended to depict real persons, places, characters, and events. Any correlation with natural persons (living or deceased), places, characters, and events are entirely coincidental.   Said fictional characters depicted in Jock Studio and on blitsgames.com are not under the age of eighteen (18) years old.  All relevant information concerning the characters in Jock Studio and on blitsgames.com can be found on their respective individual profiles on our kickstarter and game page.
